item.title: The Feels Like Shit Checklist
item.description:
If you feel like shit, do all of the following you haven’t:

Today: ☐ Take your meds ☐ Have a meal ☐ Go outside ☐ Change clothes ☐ Clean yourself up

In the past couple hours: ☐ Drink water ☐ Have a snack ☐ Stretch ☐ Change scenery
